Title: Relates to the definition of income for tax abatement for rent-controlled and rent regulated property occupied by senior citizens or persons with disabilities
Summary: Relates to the definition of income for tax abatement for rent-controlled and rent regulated property occupied by senior citizens or persons with disabilities.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to the definition of income for tax abatement for rent-controlled and rent regulated property occupied by senior citizens or persons with disabilities
